thread.title: EXCLUSIVE: Fenerbahce legend Stephen Appiah arrives in Turkey for tonight's Istanbul derby against Galatasaray
thread.title_full: EXCLUSIVE: Fenerbahce legend Stephen Appiah arrives in Turkey for tonight's Istanbul derby against Galatasaray

title: EXCLUSIVE: Fenerbahce legend Stephen Appiah arrives in Turkey for tonight's Istanbul derby against Galatasaray
text:
16:40 CET EXCLUSIVE: Fenerbahce legend Stephen Appiah arrives in Turkey for tonight's Istanbul derby against Galatasaray - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Fenerbahce legend Stephen Appiah has arrived in Turkey for the country’s biggest football game as the Istanbul side take on their bitterest rivals Galatasaray on Sunday night, GHANAsoccernet.com can exclusively reveal. 
The Ghana legend was handed a special invitation by one of Turkey’s biggest businessmen to watch the two leading football clubs, FenerbahÃ§e of Istanbul’s Asian side and Galatasaray from the European side. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us The wise man in the storm prays God, not for safety from danger, but for deliverance from fear. By: Ralph Waldo Emerson
